short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test out your clicking accuracy with our simple and easy dynamic accuracy test from ClickingTests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you know how precise your clicking is? You can find out now with ClickingTest's dynamic accuracy clicking test!

Our free and easy to use game will allow you to learn about your clicking precision and how well you can keep up with the targets.

HOW IT WORKS
1. Choose your settings. You can choose the difficulty, the timer, and the cursor.
2. Once happy with your selection press the start test button
3. Take the test and review your results
4. Press try again to take the test again with the same settings, or press change settings to alter the test

It is that easy and will take less than a minute! Get your results, try to beat them and if it is too easy change the settings up.
